SELECT FitemId itemId, FdeviceId deviceId, Fimei imei, Fmac mac, Fmac2 mac2, Fextr extr, FappVer appVer, FchannelId channelId, FplatType platType, FclientIp clientIp, Fstate state, FcreateTime createTime, FmodifyTime modifyTime FROM t_device_info where Fstate = 1
and FitemId = #itemId#
and FdeviceId = #deviceId#
and Fimei = #imei#

SELECT Fuid userId, Fuser_name userName, Ftrue_name trueName, Fpwd userPwd, Fpay_pwd userPayPassword, Fsex sex, Fmobile mobile, Femail email, Fphone phone, Fcre_type creType, Fcre_id creId, Fstate state, Flstate logicState, Fip regIp, Fuser_seed userSeed, Fsign sign, Fcreate_time createTime, Fmodify_time modifyTime, Flogin_ip loginIp, Flogin_time loginTime, Fpwd_mtime pwdModTime, Fpwd_ip pwdModIp, Fpaypwd_mtime payPwdModTime, Fpaypwd_ip payPwdModIp, Fquestion1 question1, Fanswer1 answer1, Fmemo memo FROM t_user_info where Fuser_name = #userName#
